item.description:
Come play with us! Here's what is in store for you:

  • 8:45 - Toss the disc around, meet folks, be merry
  • 9:00 - Overview of the rules, safety, etc - then divide into teams
  • 9:10 - Play!!!!!!
  • 10:30 - Conclude the meetup with snacks and socializing

Here's what we humbly ask of you (works great as a checklist):

  • Please RSVP so we can accommodate accordingly
  • Please bring a light-colored shirt
  • Please bring water
  • Please arrive on time if you can
  • If you are a regular, please consider bringing a buck for the Frisbee Fund

As usual, we will supply the frisbees, cones, lanyards, first aid supplies (hopefully will never be used) and our pretty smiles. As we periodically mention, all these supplies are paid out-of-pocket by your loving Frisbee organizers and everyone has been so generous with their donations to-date. Thank you and let's keep the dream alive!

-Amy & Jim
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be throwing light-up discs around; you can't miss us.
item.why: We're fun. We glow in the dark. You love frisbee, and we love you.
item.name: Friday Light-Up Frisbee
